Class Fruit

java.lang.Object
pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.strategy.Gravity
pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.gameprops.GameProp
pers.yuyanzhou.bubblebobble.object.gameprops.Fruit
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameObject
public class Fruit extends GameProp
Fruit create by Enemy when its dead. Fruit is able to pick up by Hero. Fruit falls onto the PlatformUnit or FloorUnit and will not disappear
Author:
YuyanZhou
